WorkItem.Description:
The SimpleIoc's Method GetAllInstances(Type serviceType) should return a List<serviceType>, too, even if it is just an abstract base class. If you register some ViewModels which inherit from ViewModelBase, a call like
SimpleIoc.Default.GetAllInstances(typeof(ViewModelBase)) or SimpleIoc.Default.GetAllInstances<ViewModelBase>() should return all registered ViewModels.
WorkItem.Summary: SimpleIoc-Method GetAllInstances(Type serviceType) extension to base classes
